attributes.action: children  to be allowed to use your phone in school and to be able to go toilet
attributes.additional_details: So that children don’t have to wait long periods of time, to go to the toilet and so that children can use their phone for support with the rule that if your caught messing around it gets taken away from them
attributes.background: I would like them to allow children in schools to be able to go to the toilet as a human right and to be able to go. They should be allowed to use their phone for certain reasons

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Require schools to allow children to bring a mobile phone into secondary school: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641178

Don't ban the use of mobile phones during break times: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/645348

Require schools to allow students to have access to the toilet during lessons: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643422
